inclusion.criterion: clinical diagnosis of obstructive sleep apnea (OSA) and excessive daytime sleepiness
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: body mass index of at least 25 kg/m^2
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of coronary artery disease, transient ischemic attack, stroke
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: currently taking anti-psychotic, anti-depressive, or hypnotic medications
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: females currently taking hormone replacement therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status with hypoxia and O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
